Package io.atlasmap.service

Class ModuleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atlasmap.service.BaseAtlasService
      • io.atlasmap.service.ModuleService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvService, DfdlService, JavaService, JsonService, KafkaConnectService, XmlService
    public abstract class ModuleService
extends BaseAtlasService
    The base class for module services which provides Document format specific backend REST services.

    • Method Detail

      • getField

        public abstract Field getField​(String path,
                               boolean recursive)
        Gets the Document Field that has the given path. If the field is a COMPLEX field and the recursive is true, the children are also filled.
        Parameters:
        path - the field path
        recursive - set true to get a field tree including children
        Returns:
        the field

      • searchFields

        public abstract List<Field> searchFields​(String keywords)
        Searches the Document Field that matches with the given keywords.
        Parameters:
        keywords - keywords
        Returns:
        matched fields

                                               File spec)
                                        throws AtlasException
        Perform Document inspection and store the inspection result.
        Parameters:
        mappingDefinitionId - Mapping Definition ID
        meta - DocumentMetadata
        spec - Document Specification
        Throws:
        AtlasException

        protected <T extends BaseInspectionRequest> DocumentMetadata createDocumentMetadataFrom​(T request,

        Returns:

      • storeDocumentMetadata

        protected void storeDocumentMetadata​(Integer mappingDefinitionId,
                                     DataSourceType dsType,
                                     String documentId,
                                     DocumentMetadata metadata)
        Persists the InspectionRequest object as a Document metadata. The combination of the InspectionRequest and the Document specification stored with storeDocumentSpecification(Integer,DataSourceType,String,InputStream) have to be a complete set for reproducing Document inspection.
        Parameters:
        mappingDefinitionId - Mapping Definition ID
        dsType - DataSourceType indicating SOURCE or TARGET
        documentId - Document ID
        metadata - Document inspection request object, which contains Document metadata such as Document ID/name/description, inspection parameters, etc

      • storeDocumentSpecification

        protected void storeDocumentSpecification​(Integer mappingDefinitionId,
                                          DataSourceType dsType,
                                          String documentId,
                                          InputStream specification)
        Persists the Document specification such as JSON schema for the JSON Document. The combination of the InspectionRequest stored with storeDocumentMetadata(Integer,DataSourceType,String,DocumentMetadata) and the Document specification have to be a complete set for reproducing Document inspection.
        Parameters:
        mappingDefinitionId - Mapping Definition ID
        dsType - DataSourceType indicating SOURCE or TARGET
        documentId - Document ID
        specification - The Document specification to be inspected

      • storeInspectionResult

        protected void storeInspectionResult​(Integer mappingDefinitionId,
                                     DataSourceType dsType,
                                     String documentId,
                                     Serializable resultObject)
        Persists the Document inspection result as a JSON file. The resultObject argument has to be serializable with Jackson.
        Parameters:
        mappingDefinitionId - Mapping Definition ID
        dsType - DataSourceType indicating SOURCE or TARGET
        documentId - Document ID
        resultObject - Document inspection result object

      • ping

        @GET
@Path("/ping")
@Produces("text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response ping()
        Simple liveness check method used in liveness checks. Must not be protected via authetication.
        Returns:
        pong
